original: 9 Dhammayamaka🔽9.3. Bhāvanāvāra🔽Yo kusalaṁ dhammaṁ bhāveti so akusalaṁ dhammaṁ pajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: dhamma yamaka  bhāvanāvāra  yaḥ kusalam dhammam bhāveti saḥ akusalam dhammam pajahati iti āmantā
translated: The Pairs on the True Way🔽… The Section on Development🔽“When someone develops wholesome qualities, does he abandon unwholesome qualities?”

original: Yo vā pana akusalaṁ dhammaṁ pajahati so kusalaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo kusalaṁ dhammaṁ na bhāveti so akusalaṁ dhammaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana akusalam dhammam pajahati saḥ kusalam dhammam bhāveti iti āmantā  yaḥ kusalam dhammam na bhāveti saḥ akusalam dhammam na pajahati iti āmantā
translated: “When someone abandons unwholesome qualities, does he develop wholesome qualities?”🔽“When someone doesn’t develop wholesome qualities, does he not abandon unwholesome qualities?”

original: Yo vā pana akusalaṁ dhammaṁ nappajahati so kusalaṁ dhammaṁ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā …pe….🔽Bhāvanāvāro.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana akusalam dhammam na pajahati saḥ kusalam dhammam na bhāveti iti āmantā pe  bhāvanā vāraḥ
translated: “When someone doesn’t abandon unwholesome qualities, does he not develop wholesome qualities?”🔽The Section on Development is finished.
The Pairs on the True Way is finished.
